nodes.text: KOTOR Campaign Guide Web Enhancement 2: Captain Dallan Morvis

KOTOR Campaign Guide Web Enhancement 2: Captain Dallan Morvis is an online supplement for Star Wars Roleplaying Game, written by John Jackson Miller. It was published on the Wizards of the Coast website on September 11, 2008 and is a second in the series of web enhancements, which present material that didn't made it into Knights of the Old Republic Campaign Guide because of space reasons. This article covers Captain Dallan Morvis of the Mandalorian Wars.
